abstract: Ukrainian authorities have clamped down on border-crossings between rebel-held east and rest of country in effort to isolate separatist territory and force Russia to assume economic responsibility for it; move has made life difficult for ordinary citizens in east, cutting off access to many services; Ukraine's move appears aimed at burdening Russia and forcing settlement.
lead_paragraph: After new border restrictions were put in place, a policy of isolating and frustrating rebel-held regions has taken a major and maddening turn.

byline.original: By RICK LYMAN and ANDREW E. KRAMER

snippet: After new border restrictions were put in place, a policy of isolating and frustrating rebel-held regions has taken a major and maddening turn.

headline.main: Ukraine Clamps Down on Travel to and From Rebel Areas
headline.print_headline: Ukraine Clamps Down on Travel to and From Rebel Areas
